none: Wise Up - Take New Steps demo '93
Wise Up - Take New Steps demo '93

Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 12, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
I guess this one kinda sounds how it looks like it sounds, if that makes any sense? Fast, positive hardcore with gratuitous breakdowns - I suppose it's pretty early in the game for a country not exactly (or even a little bit) known for straight edge HC. This shit is by-the-books to be sure, but the shit is good and the fact that it's derivative does not bother me in the least. And it shouldn't bother you either. TAKE NEW STEPS
https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-RUO5aXfsxoE/VGLy0lhr5II/AAAAAAAALIo/buJ-0HgiqkY/s1600/wise%2Bup%2Bcover.jpg
